root.name: Zen-Nippon Pro Wrestling Jet
root.description: OverviewÂ Zen-Nippon Pro Wrestling Jet is a professional wrestling game published by NCS Corporation and released on the Game Boy in Japan. Zen-Nippon features a password save system to continue progress. Zen-Nippon has three levels of difficulty: easy, medium, and hard.

similar_games.game: Zen-Nippon Pro Wrestling: Fight da Pon!
